text: Yadi timila'i yasa kurako bhaya cha ki timile anatha balikaharusita vivaha garera tiniharusita n'yaya garna sakdainau bhane, tini baheka timile mana para'eko an'ya du'i, tina va carasanga nikaha garihala ra yadi yasa kurako bhaya cha ki sabai svasniharusamga samana n'yayapurna vyavahara garna sakdainau bhane ta e'utai svasni paryapta cha. Athava timro svamitvama rahane dasi. Yo sambhava cha yasabata timiharu an'yaya garnabata bamcna sakdachau
